Tracy Beaker is back and now she has a daughter in tow.
New CBBC series My Mum Tracy Beaker, which starts today, sees Dani Harmer reprise the role she made famous 20 years ago.

articles.title: Phoebe Bridgers responds to online overreaction to her guitar smashing - MusicRadar
articles.description: “People were saying it’s derived or corny. And I’m like ‘Well yeah, it’s derived and corny after the first time somebody did it."
articles.content: Maybe we're just extremely rock n' roll here but we're honestly surprised at the level of online brouhaha that followed musician Phoebe Bridgers smashing her Danelectro electric guitar over a speaker… [+986 chars]
